name: real-estate-blockchain-mas-2025
description: Real Estate Blockchain + Multi-Agent System for 2025 Malaysian Auction Property Market

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build-all: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test-all: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test
scripts.deploy-contracts: cd contracts && npx hardhat deploy --network polygon

author: Malaysian PropTech Consortium
contributors: Real Estate & Housing Developers Association Malaysia
